context.title: EUROCONTROL Argument
context.description: This element represents an argument node in a EUROCONTROL argument. A goal (or sub-goal) captures an intention of what the argument is meant to accomplish.

context.title: EUROCONTROL Strategy
context.description: This element represents a strategy in a EUROCONTROL argument. Use these nodes to decompose a higher-level argument into a strategy for achieving that goal.

context.title: EUROCONTROL Solution
context.description: This element represents a solution in a EUROCONTROL argument. A solution is meant to fulfill its parent goal.

context.title: EUROCONTROL Assumption
context.description: This element represents an assumption in a EUROCONTROL argument. Assumption nodes capture information necessary to support the argument, but which may be challenged.

context.title: EUROCONTROL Justification
context.description: This element represents a justification in a EUROCONTROL argument. A justification explains why a particular strategy has been adopted.

context.title: EUROCONTROL Context
context.description: This element represents a context in a EUROCONTROL argument. A context node attaches contextual information to another node to explain its relevance.

context.title: EUROCONTROL Criteria
context.description: This element represents a criterion in a EUROCONTROL argument. A criteria node attaches assessment support information to another node.
